name.str_pl: copies of Gushin Lineages Vol. I

description: "Ramon. Founder of Gushin. Unified the forty-seven clans of East Vaie. Posthumous name of Protoshin. Sevan. Second Leader of Gushin. Grandson of Ramon. Integrated thirteen more clans. Posthumous title of 'the Lord'. Defis. Third Leader of Gushin. Defied the will of Absolution. Executed. Disgraced. No grave of him is extant. Posthumous title of 'the Filthy' granted by Absolution."

name.str_pl: copies of Gushin Lineages Vol. II

description: "(...) Ilian. Twenty-first Leader of Gushin. Sought a different path. Disappeared without a trace. Posthumous title of 'the Bloodless' granted by Absolution. (...) Reqis. Forty-ninth Leader of Gushin. Attempted to dig to the other side of the planet. Posthumous name of Terran. (...) Hsua-Lja. Fifty-seventh Leader of Gushin. Entered into direct servitude to an Absolution Deliverer. Gave birth to twenty-three children. Posthumous title of 'the Womburn' granted by Absolution."

name.str_pl: copies of Gushin Lineages Vol. III

description: "(...) Mebastian Ence. Eighty-fourth Leader of Gushin. Treated as a false leader. Did not possess approval of Absolution. Disputed leadership position. Referred to as Warlord in Absolution archives, not Leader. (...) Eliot Martin Wes. Eighty-eighth Leader of Gushin. Grandson of Mebastian Ence. Absolution offered to make him Leader if he spat at his grandfather's grave and desecrated it by turning it into a public toilet, with him taking the first honors of defecating over it. He obliged. Posthumous title of 'the Pathetic' granted by Absolution."

name.str_pl: copies of Gushin Lineages Vol. IV

description: "(...) Harthfl. Ninety-first Leader of Gushin. Nobody. (...) Jai Heun-seo. One-hundred-and-sixth Leader of Gushin. Declared war against Absolution. Tortured for eleven years. Posthumous title of 'the Licker' granted by Absolution. (...) Ryuol. One-hundred-and-fourteenth Leader of Gushin. Never stepped out of bounds. Knew his place. Posthumous name of Loyaa."

name.str_pl: copies of Gushin Lineages Vol. V

description: "(...) Huji. One-hundred-and-thirty-third Leader of Gushin. Cannibal. Posthumous title of 'the Wolf' granted by Absolution. (...) Yaui. One-hundred-and-forty-second Leader of Gushin. Psychopath. Posthumous title of 'the Valorant' granted by Absolution. (...) Turka. One-hundred-and-fifty-sixth Leader of Gushin. Monster. Posthumous title of 'the Exemplar' granted by Absolution. (...) Urzl. One-hundred-and-seventy-first Leader of Gushin. Short. Posthumous title of 'the Beautiful' granted by Absolution."
